answers.answer: Hi there and welcome.  Well, I think a trip to the doctor is in order.  They may run a screen on you for diabetes as this is a symptom of it.  Have you ruled out pregnancy by the way?  No history of abnormal symptoms when having a UTI?  I would just get this checked as soon as possible as i think your doctor will be able to help you.  good luck

question: At night I have frequent urination at least twice an hour starting around 2am to 6am.   Each time urinating as though I had a full glasses of water but I do not drink anything after 10p.   I also have pain in my lower right side while sleeping.
title: frequent
